TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
Il Villaggio Arboricolo entra in gioco TAPpato.
Das Baumwipfeldorf kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Le Village arboricole arrive en jeu engagé.{T} : Ajoutez {G} à votre réserve.
La Aldea en las copas entra en juego girada.
樹上の村はタップ状態で場に出る。
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
Селение Верхолазов входит в игру повернутым.
Aldeia nas Copas entra em jogo virado.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if TriggerObject() ~= nil then TriggerObject():ComesIntoPlayTapped() end

MANA_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {T}: Aggiungi {G} alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}: Agrega {G} a tu reserva de maná.
{T}： あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。
{T}: Adicione {G} à sua reserva de mana.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

{1}{G}: Il Villaggio Arboricolo diventa una creatura Scimpanzé 3/3 verde con travolgere fino alla fine del turno. E' ancora una terra. (Se sta per infliggere alle sue creature bloccanti danno da combattimento sufficiente a distruggerle, puoi farle infliggere il resto del suo danno al giocatore in difesa.)

{1}{G}: Das Baumwipfeldorf wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/3 grünen Menschenaffenkreatur, die Trampelschaden verursacht. Es ist immer noch ein Land. (Falls es seinen Blockern genug Schaden zufügen würde, um sie zu zerstören, kannst du es den Rest des Schadens dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen.)

{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

{1}{G}: La Aldea en las copas se convierte en una criatura Simio verde 3/3 con la habilidad de arrollar hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra. (Si fuera a hacer suficiente daño de combate a sus bloqueadores como para destruirlos, puedes hacer que le haga el resto del daño al jugador defensor.)
{1}{G}：ターン終了時まで、樹上の村はトランプルを持つ緑の３/３の類人猿クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。 （それが自身をブロックしているすべてのクリーチャーを破壊するのに十分な戦闘ダメージを与える場合、あなたはそれの残りのダメージを防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。）

{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

{1}{G}: Селение Верхолазов становится существом 3/3 зеленая Обезьяна с Пробивным ударом до конца хода. При этом оно остается землей. (Если оно нанесло достаточно боевых повреждений, чтобы уничтожить блокирующие его существа, вы можете нанести оставшиеся повреждения защищающемуся игроку.)

{1}{G}: Aldeia nas Copas torna-se uma criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Símio com atropelar até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno. (Se ela fosse causar dano de combate suficiente para destruir seus bloqueadores, você pode fazer com que ela cause o resto de seu dano ao jogador defensor.)
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:CardType_GetWritable(target):Add( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE, target ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Set( 3 ) characteristics:Toughness_Set( 3 ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then target:GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable(target):Add( CREATURE_TYPE_APE, target ) end
local target = Object() if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) end
